name: Chestnut Goat: Cool Mint
description: A breed of goat native to Nod-Krai. Its horns and markings look like they've been applied with a generous spread of mint juice.\nAfter moving into the Serenitea Pot, their fleece has grown ever fluffier. Come shedding season, a gentle "fluff drizzle" falls all around them...\nFor reasons unknown, some animals that enter the Realm Within retain their peculiar appearance shaped by the force of kuuvahki. To help Tubby identify them, Paimon has thoughtfully given them new names based on said appearance...
